description.brief: Integration of Stanford WBC as PR2 controller plugin.

package.description: This package contains an adaptation of the Stanford Whole-Body Control Framework (WBC) for PR2. It relies mainly on the joint-space dynamic model which is part of WBC. For the moment, this does not run as a real-time process --- instead, there is a "pump" controller plugin which sends robot state from real-time to user-space and the torque commands back from user-space into the real-time controller.
package.author: Roland Philippsen
